original_text: So you know the right thing that you ought to do. But if you know that and you do not do the right thing, then you have done a wrong thing.
korean_text: 그러므로 사람이 선을 행할 줄 알고도 행하지 아니하면 죄니라

sentences.original_text: So you know the right thing
and you do not do the right thing
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 당신이 올바른 것을 하지 않는다면

sentences.original_text: then you have done a wrong thing
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 당신은 잘못된 것을 한 것입니다
